original: māyāmayaṃ jagadidaṃ pratibhāti tasya tasmāt sukhādiṣu bhavatyavikāradhīraḥ // Ps_6.61 //
analyzed: māyā mayam jagat idam pratibhāti tasya tasmāt sukha ādiṣu bhavati avikāra dhīraḥ

original: āsīdbhaviṣyati ca yat tad apīdṛgeva kaḥ saṃbhavo yadasukhaṃ na bhaved bhavebhyaḥ /
analyzed: āsīt bhaviṣyati ca yat tat api īdṛś eva kaḥ saṃbhavaḥ yat asukham na bhavet bhavebhyaḥ

original: evaṃ vyatītaviṣayeṣvapi vītarāgo naivābhinandati bhavāṃśca bhaviṣyato 'pi // Ps_6.62 //
analyzed: evam vyatīta viṣayeṣu api vīta rāgaḥ nā eva abhinandati bhavān ca
ākāra bheda paruṣe puruṣaḥ arādhī kaḥ nāma gūḍha nakhara sphuṭa dṛṣṭi cihne

original: tatpraiṣyavṛttikapaṭānyanucintya rajyed viśvāsameva ca yathocitamatra yāyāt // Ps_6.63 //
analyzed: tad praiṣya vṛttika paṭāni anucintya rajyet viśvāsam eva ca yathocitam atra yāyāt
evam vimukta matiḥ api anukampakaḥ tu kleśa antaram jagat anātham avekṣamāṇaḥ

original: hīneṣu niṣpraṇayabuddhirudārabhāvān nirvātumicchati na buddhaguṇānalabdhvā // Ps_6.64 //
analyzed: hīneṣu niṣpraṇaya buddhiḥ udāra bhāvān nirvātum icchati na buddha guṇān a labdhvā
loka artha sādhana vidhau asamartha rūpam yāna dvayam samavādhūya sa pūrvam eva
kāruṇya deśita pathaḥ muni rājayānam ātasthivān para hita eka rasa svabhāvam

original: hīnociteṣu na matirnamati praṇītā saṃtiṣṭhate mahati nāmahatī kadā cit /
analyzed: hīna uciteṣu na matiḥ namati praṇītā saṃtiṣṭhate mahati na a mahatī kadā cit

original: saṃsyandate śucibhireva śucisvabhāvaṃ tulyaistathānyadapi śāsvata eṣa yogaḥ // Ps_6.66 //
analyzed: saṃsyandate śucibhiḥ eva śuci svabhāvam tulyaiḥ tathā anyat api śāsvataḥ eṣa yogaḥ

original: svapnopamāni vigaṇayya sukhāsukhāni saṃmohadoṣakṛpaṇāṃ janatāṃ ca teṣu /
analyzed: svapna upamāni vigaṇayya sukha asukhāni saṃmoha doṣa kṛpaṇām janatām ca teṣu

original: ātmārtha eva gurutāṃ katham asya yāyād vyāpārabhāramavadhūya parārtharamyam // Ps_6.67 //
analyzed: ātma arthaḥ eva guru tām katham asya yāyāt vyāpāra bhāram avadhūya parārtha ramyam
yaḥ sarva loka hita kāraṇa sarva ceṣṭaḥ tyaktvā ātma dṛṣṭi viṣayam vitatha abhimānam

original: sarvatra śāntamatiradvayamārgacārī so 'tyadbhutaścaritanirvṛta eva loke // Ps_6.68 //
analyzed: sarvatra śānta matiḥ advaya mārga cārī saḥ tyadbhutaḥ carita nirvṛtaḥ eva loke
prajñā viśuddhi karam uttama yānam etat sarvajña tā tad udayā hi mahā munīnām

original: lokasya yā nayanatāmiva saṃprayāti dīptāṃśumaṇḍalatalotpatitā prabheva // Ps_6.69 //
analyzed: lokasya yā nayana tām iva saṃprayāti dīpta aṃśu maṇḍala tala utpatitā prabhā iva
saṃsāra doṣa bhara nirmathitaḥ pi nā eva prajñā vivecana tayā parikhīdyate yaḥ

original: nātmābhikhedapariviklavatāṃ sa yāti yānasya buddhaguṇasaṃjananasya loke // Ps_6.70 //
analyzed: na ātma abhikheda pariviklava tām sa yāti yānasya buddha guṇa saṃjananasya loke
paśyanti ca abhuta mayam sugata prabhāvam romāñca kañcukita sarva śarīra deśāḥ

original: tadgāminaṃ pariharanti ca yānamārgaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇamṛte śaṭhaceṣṭitebhyaḥ // Ps_6.71 //
analyzed: tad gāminam pariharanti ca yāna mārgam kim nāma kāraṇam ṛte śaṭha ceṣṭitebhyaḥ
kaḥ nāma māra kalinā an abhibhūta cetāḥ saṃbuddha dharma guṇa ratna nidhāna bhūtam

original: sarvajñayānamapayānam anarthapaṅkād ākroṣṭumarhati na cejjagato 'sya vairam // Ps_6.72 //
analyzed: sarvajña yānam apayānam anartha paṅkāt ākroṣṭum arhati na ced jagataḥ sya vairam
loka artha sādhana pare jina rāja vaṃśe prajñā nimīlita nayeṣu pariskhalatsu

original: cittaṃ narasya karuṇāmṛdu kasya na syāt tanmohadoṣaśamanāya dṛḍhaṃ ca vīryam // Ps_6.73 //
analyzed: cittam narasya karuṇā mṛdu kasya na syāt tat moha doṣa śamanāya dṛḍham ca vīryam

original: prajñāyā janayati yaḥ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ nirmokṣaḥ kathamiva tasya dūrataḥ syāt /
analyzed: prajñāyāḥ janayati yaḥ parām viśuddhim nirmokṣaḥ katham iva tasya dūratas syāt

original: naivāsmātparataramasti śīlam anyat tattasmād bhajata vimokṣakāṅkṣiṇo hi // Ps_6.74 //
analyzed: na eva asmāt parataram asti śīlam anyat tat tasmāt bhajata vimokṣa kāṅkṣiṇaḥ hi
prajñāpāramitā samāsaḥ ca ayam pāramitā samāsaḥ
viśuddha maunīndra manaḥ taḍāga prasūta sūtrānta saroruhebhyaḥ
ādāya śura bhramareṇa samyak madhu ūrjitam pāramitā samāse
